update WATER_QUALITY_FC

CHROMIUM_TY = #{chromiumTy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LEAD_SY = #{leadSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEAD_TY = #{leadTy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CYANIDE = #{cyanide,jdbcType=FLOAT},
CYANIDE_SY = #{cyanideSy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CYANIDE_TY = #{cyanideTy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHENOL = #{phenol,jdbcType=FLOAT},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
